definition: final particle expressing exhortation, admiration etc
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
interjection of pain or surprise/also written 哎喲|哎哟

sentences.english: Yo ho, haul together, hoist the Colors high.
sentences.chinese: 唷吼，一起轉航，揚起船旗。

sentences.english: Phew. Yes, today we celebrate our independence from Britain.
sentences.chinese: 唷，是的，今天我們要慶祝脫離英國而獨立。

sentences.english: Argh ! get water in my ear .
sentences.chinese: 哎唷，水灌進耳朵裏去了。

sentences.english: Eric:Yes, smart phones are really smart. Mine can even translate.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，智慧型手機真的很聰明呢，我這臺還會翻譯唷。

sentences.english: Well,the bottle is not in her room.
Tammuz, like his supposed father, became a hunter.
sentences.chinese: 齋戒像他的哎唷父親，成爲一個獵人。

sentences.english: Remembered when yesterday after a roadside clinic, sees inside many people.
sentences.chinese: 記得昨天經過路邊一間診所時，看到裏面好多人唷。

sentences.english: Phew, that was a long sentence.
Argh! Get water in my ear.
sentences.chinese: 哎唷，水灌進耳朵裏去了。

sentences.english: Holy moly, what are those giant shoes doing outside Jenny's door?
sentences.chinese: 哎唷，誰的鞋子那麼大在她的門口？

definition: (sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)
(particle) marker of surprise, sudden realization, reminder
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
onomat. for surprise, amazement and sigh
phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
oh (expression of agreement or surprise)/(Cantonese) not
